/**
 * 订阅套餐Tab页面
 * 显示用户当前订阅和可用套餐
 */import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Card,CardBody,CardHeader,Button,Chip,Spinner,Modal,ModalContent,ModalHeader,ModalBody,ModalFooter,Divider}from'@heroui/react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{Package,Star,Crown,AlertCircle,CheckCircle,QrCode}from'lucide-react';import{packageUserApi,orderUserApi}from'../../../services/userApi';import QRCodeGenerator from'qrcode-generator';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const SubscriptionTab=()=>{const[packages,setPackages]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');const[selectedPackage,setSelectedPackage]=useState(null);const[orderInfo,setOrderInfo]=useState(null);const[orderLoading,setOrderLoading]=useState(false);const[paymentModal,setPaymentModal]=useState(false);const[paymentStatus,setPaymentStatus]=useState('pending');const[checkInterval,setCheckInterval]=useState(null);// 获取套餐列表
const fetchPackages=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);setError('');const response=await packageUserApi.getPackages();if(response.code===20000){setPackages(response.data||[]);}else{setError(response.msg||'获取套餐列表失败');}}catch(err){setError(err instanceof Error?err.message:'网络错误');}finally{setLoading(false);}};// 创建订单
const createOrder=async packageId=>{try{setOrderLoading(true);const response=await orderUserApi.createOrder(packageId);if(response.code===20000){setOrderInfo(response.data);setPaymentModal(true);setPaymentStatus('pending');startPaymentStatusCheck(response.data.order_id);}else{alert(response.msg||'创建订单失败');}}catch(err){alert(err instanceof Error?err.message:'网络错误');}finally{setOrderLoading(false);}};// 开始检查支付状态
const startPaymentStatusCheck=orderId=>{if(checkInterval){clearInterval(checkInterval);}const interval=setInterval(async()=>{try{setPaymentStatus('checking');const response=await orderUserApi.getPayStatus(orderId);if(response.code===20000){setPaymentStatus('success');clearInterval(interval);setTimeout(()=>{setPaymentModal(false);fetchPackages();// 刷新套餐列表
},3000);}else if(response.code===20001){setPaymentStatus('pending');}else{setPaymentStatus('failed');clearInterval(interval);}}catch(err){console.error('检查支付状态失败:',err);}},3000);// 每3秒检查一次
setCheckInterval(interval);};// 生成二维码
const generateQRCode=text=>{const qr=QRCodeGenerator(0,'M');qr.addData(text);qr.make();return qr.createDataURL(8,4);};// 获取套餐等级样式

const getPackageIcon=level=>{switch(level.toLowerCase()){case'base':return Package;case'plus':return Star;case'pro':case'premium':return Crown;default:return Package;}};// 关闭支付弹窗
const closePaymentModal=()=>{if(checkInterval){clearInterval(checkInterval);setCheckInterval(null);}setPaymentModal(false);setOrderInfo(null);setPaymentStatus('pending');};useEffect(()=>{fetchPackages();// 清理定时器
